channel.title: Nakedsoul Radio Show (New Podcast!)
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Naked Soul Sessions is a LIVE internet radio show broadcasting from the U.K each and every week
channel.itunes:author: M C
channel.itunes:summary:
The Naked Soul Sessions is a LIVE internet radio show broadcasting from the U.K each and every week
Don't miss Dj Myles and his special guests as he brings you the underground sounds of the U.K every Monday.
channel.description:
The Naked Soul Sessions is a LIVE internet radio show broadcasting from the U.K each and every week
Don't miss Dj Myles and his special guests as he brings you the underground sounds of the U.K every Monday.

item.title: Nakedsoul Radio Show - June 6th - DJ Myles rocking out the soulful jams for 2 hours
item.itunes:author: DJ Myles
item.itunes:subtitle:
Show 325 - DJ Myles plays the best in soulful house music. Catch DJ Myles live at 93 Feet East Bar in London on Thu Jun 9th. Details at www.handonradio.fm
---------------------------------------------------------------- Rocco & Robert Walker- I Love
item.itunes:summary:
Show 325 - DJ Myles plays the best in soulful house music. Catch DJ Myles live at 93 Feet East Bar in London on Thu Jun 9th. Details at www.handonradio.fm
---------------------------------------------------------------- Rocco & Robert Walker- I Love the Night (Raw Artistic Soul Dub) Richy Pitch - Dey Suffer (Kaytronik Dem Beat Suffer Remix) DJ Man X & Albert Sterling Mendez feat Josh Milan - Consequences DJ Spen pres. Sheila Ford & Terry Thompson – Fantastic DJN Project - Musiq (Soulmagic Remix) Danny Clark & Jay Benham Ft. Annette Taylor - Better Day DJ T. Feat. James Teej - Sense (Tale Of Us Remix) Prince - One (Shelter Vocal) Jill Scott – Cross My Mind (Salah Ananse Remix) Steffi – Yours & Mine David Labeij - Feel Like Doing Maya Jane Coles - The High Life T. Williams feat. Terri Walker - Heartbeat Nina Simone – Sinnerman (Luciano Remix) Reel People You Used To Hold Me So Tight [Phil Asher's restless soul Vocal Mix] Studio Apartment feat Rae - Your Words (David Penn Vocal Mix) Leviticus - Life Story (Shelter Vocal)
